channel.title: Help me please?!?!?!
channel.description: hello my name is xlo, i am a mod on pur3zscape 525, my prob is that there are 2 kids using a cheat client, then giveing out link to all the players, i need to know how to make it so only thre officail client cant connect to the server, no other client but our, i have seen a few servers like that, but they didnt tell me how, please i am begging!!!!! tell me how to make it like that please!!!!

item.title: Help me please?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @Crackbone Crackbone
item.description:
@Crackbone wrote:

Sorry,but,I didn’t understand anything from your post…

You want to say…that there are two people on your server using a client which has got 1337 hax?
Well,just IP ban anyone who uses the “hax”-client…
That’s what I can think of at the time…
